catalog_info.title: Empirical Methods in Corporate Finance
catalog_info.notes: Paul Gompers (Business School), Samuel Gregory Hanson, Victoria Izashina, and Adi Sunderam Structured to minimize overlap with Economics 2725. Seminar format; students write referee reports and a research paper. Offered jointly with the Business School as 4220.
catalog_info.description: Examines empirical research in corporate finance. Covers empirical research methodology, financial institutions, and financial policy. Major emphasis is on how to do well-executed and persuasive research in corporate finance.
